english: Excuse me, could you tell me the way?

french: Il est une personne très gentille.
english: He is a very kind person.
I would like to drink some coffee.

french: Je fais du jogging tous les matins.

english: Have you ever spoken to him?

french: Je vais à l'école en voiture.
english: I go to school by car.
We are going to see a movie.
She is wearing a beautiful dress.

french: Nous sommes dans la même classe.
english: We are in the same class.

french: J'ai été surpris par la nouvelle.
english: I was surprised by the news.

french: Nous avons fait un pique-nique dans le parc.
english: We had a picnic in the park.

french: J'ai mangé du pain au petit déjeuner.
Nous sommes amis depuis le lycée.
english: We have been friends since high school.

french: Je prévois d'aller chez le médecin la semaine prochaine.
english: I am planning to go to the doctor next week.

french: Nous avons parlé jusqu'à tard hier soir.
english: We talked until late last night.
She is looking for a new job.

french: J'ai mis du temps à comprendre cela.
english: It took me a while to understand it.

french: Nous nous sommes rencontrés au cinéma.
english: We met at the movie theater.

french: Il lit le journal tous les matins.
english: He reads the newspaper every morning.
I am going to call him.

french: Il m'a donné des conseils importants.
english: He gave me some important advice.

french: Elle promène son chien tous les jours.
english: She walks her dog every day.

french: Nous allons nous marier le mois prochain.
english: We are getting married next month.
